mapper.insert: insert into book_lecture (stu_number, room_number, lec_number, rrow, collumn, time, date,score) values (#{stuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lecNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rrow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collumn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.select: select stu_number, room_number, lec_number, rrow, collumn, time, date, score from book_lecture

select lecture.title,book_lecture.lec_number , count(book_lecture.lec_number) totalLecture from book_lecture,lecture where lecture.lec_number=book_lecture.lec_number group by book_lecture.lec_number,lecture.title order by totalLecture desc limit 10
select name,stu_number,count(stu_number)stuCount from book_lecture,users where stu_number = uid group by stu_number,name order by stuCount desc limit 10

select speaker,book_lecture.lec_number , count(book_lecture.lec_number) totalLecture from book_lecture,lecture where lecture.lec_number=book_lecture.lec_number group by book_lecture.lec_number,speaker order by totalLecture desc
select stu_number,name as room_number,rrow,collumn,integrity,users.score,arrived from book_lecture,users where stu_number = uid and lec_number = #{lecNumber}
mapper.update: update book_lecture set arrived = 1 where stu_number = #{stuNumber} and lec_number = #{lecNumber}
